questionnaire.title: TELEPHONE SCREENING QUESTIONNAIRE
questionnaire.introduction: Hello, I am from a local marketing research company. A panel is being established in the Winston-Salem area to evaluate various foods, non-alcoholic beverages, and tobacco products. Periodic participation will be required, perhaps over a considerable length of time, one year, and all participants will be paid for these product evaluations. If you qualify, would you be willing to participate?

questions.question: 1. First of all, do you or does any member of your family work for...

fields: An advertising agency or marketing research company

questions.question: 3. Which of the following products do you presently use? (READ LIST - CHECK AS MANY AS APPLY)
6. Next, please describe in detail the brand name and type of your regular cigarette
questions.instruction: INTERVIEWER CHECK ONE ON ACCOMPANYING CIGARETTE BRAND LIST - IF BRAND NOT LISTED TERMINATE, ERASE & RE-USE
